questions.title: Danny Dyer: "I've buried a thousand pounds in cash in a secret location in case I ever have to go on the run."
Danny Dyer: "Possession: Last year on a visit to the zoo, I put on a mask so that no-one could recognise me. This is that mask."
Tinchy Stryder: "Sometimes I pretend to have broken something in my house so that when a man comes round to fix it I can play him at ping-pong."
Rory Reid: "I am in an ongoing feud with a cat who walked a hundred miles to torment me."
"Tomasz Schafernaker: ‚ÄùUntil my mid-30s, I had no idea that lambs were in fact baby sheep."
Romesh: "When I was a teacher, whilst trying to explain a tricky concept, I accidentally locked a pupil in a cupboard."
